post-meter.title: Natural Gas - Post Meter (annual)
post-meter.description: Annual methane emissions downstream of residential, commercial, industrial natural gas distribution meters (i.e., “Post Meter”) (inventory Energy 1B2b sub-category).

enteric-fermentation.title: Agriculture - Enteric Fermentation (annual)
enteric-fermentation.description: Annual methane emissions from enteric fermentation which is methane emitted as a by-product of the normal livestock digestive process (inventory Agriculture category 3A).

manure-management.title: Agriculture - Manure Management (annual)
manure-management.description: Annual methane emissions from livestock manure management (inventory Agriculture category 3B).

rice-cultivation.title: Agriculture - Rice Cultivation (annual)
rice-cultivation.description: Annual methane emissions from rice cultivation (inventory Agriculture category 3C).

field-burning.title: Agriculture - Field Burning (annual)
field-burning.description: Annual methane emissions from field burning of agricultural residues (inventory Agriculture category 3F).

exploration-ngs.title: Natural Gas - Exploration (annual)
exploration-ngs.description: Annual methane emissions from Natural Gas Exploration (inventory Energy 1B2b sub-category).

production-ngs.title: Natural Gas - Production (annual)
production-ngs.description: Annual methane emissions from Natural Gas Production (inventory Energy 1B2b sub-category).

transmission-storage-ngs.title: Natural Gas - Transmission and Storage (annual)
transmission-storage-ngs.description: Annual methane emissions from Natural Gas Transmission and Storage (inventory Energy 1B2b sub-category).

processing-ngs.title: Natural Gas - Processing (annual)
processing-ngs.description: Annual methane emissions from Natural Gas Processing (inventory Energy 1B2b sub-category).

distribution-ngs.title: Natural Gas - Distribution (annual)
distribution-ngs.description: Annual methane emissions from Natural Gas Distribution (inventory Energy 1B2b sub-category).

exploration-ps.title: Petroleum - Exploration (annual)
exploration-ps.description: Annual methane emissions from Petroleum Exploration (inventory Energy 1B2a sub-category).

production-ps.title: Petroleum - Production (annual)
production-ps.description: Annual methane emissions from Petroleum Production (inventory Energy 1B2a sub-category).

transport-ps.title: Petroleum - Transportation (annual)
transport-ps.description: Annual methane emissions from Petroleum Transportation (inventory Energy 1B2a sub-category).

refining-ps.title: Petroleum - Refining (annual)
refining-ps.description: Annual methane emissions from Petroleum Refining (inventory Energy 1B2a sub-category).

msw-landfill-waste.title: Waste - Municipal Solid Waste (MSW) Landfills (annual)
msw-landfill-waste.description: Annual methane emissions from Municipal Solid Waste Landfills (inventory Waste 5A1 sub-category).

industrial-landfill-waste.title: Waste - Industrial Landfills (annual)
industrial-landfill-waste.description: Annual methane emissions from Industrial Landfills (inventory Waste 5A1 sub-category).

dwtd-waste.title: Waste - Domestic Wastewater Treatment & Discharge (annual)
dwtd-waste.description: Annual methane emissions from Domestic Wastewater Treatment and Discharge (inventory Waste 5D sub-category).

iwtd-waste.title: Waste - Industrial Wastewater Treatment & Discharge (annual)
iwtd-waste.description: Annual methane emissions from Industrial Wastewater Treatment and Discharge (inventory Waste 5D sub-category).

composting-waste.title: Waste - Composting (annual)
composting-waste.description: Annual methane emissions from Composting (inventory Waste category 5B1).

underground-coal.title: Coal Mining - Underground Mining (annual)
underground-coal.description: Annual methane emissions from from active Underground Coal Mining (inventory Energy 1B1a sub-category).

surface-coal.title: Coal Mining - Surface Mining (annual)
surface-coal.description: Annual methane emissions from active Surface Coal Mining (inventory Energy 1B1a sub-category).

abn-underground-coal.title: Coal Mining - Abandoned Underground Mines (annual)
abn-underground-coal.description: Annual methane emissions from Abandoned Underground Coal Mines (inventory Energy 1B1a sub-category).

stationary-combustion-other.title: Other - Stationary Combustion (annual)
stationary-combustion-other.description: Annual methane emissions from Stationary Combustion (inventory Energy 1A sub-category).

mobile-combustion-other.title: Other - Mobile Combustion (annual)
mobile-combustion-other.description: Annual methane emissions from Mobile Combustion (inventory Energy 1A sub-category).

abn-ong-other.title: Other - Abandoned Oil and Gas Wells (annual)
abn-ong-other.description: Annual methane emissions from Abandoned Oil and Gas Wells (inventory Energy 1B2a and 1B2b sub-categories).

petro-production-other.title: Other - Petrochemical Production (annual)
petro-production-other.description: Annual methane emissions from Petrochemical Production (inventory Industrial Processes and Product Use category 2B8).

ferroalloy-production-other.title: Other - Ferroalloy Production (annual)
ferroalloy-production-other.description: Annual methane emissions from Ferroalloy Production (inventory Industrial Processes and Product Use category 2C2).

total-methane.title: Total Methane (annual)
total-methane.description: Total annual methane emission fluxes from all Agriculture, Energy, Waste, and ‘Other’ sources included in this dataset.

total-agriculture.title: Total Agriculture (annual)
total-agriculture.description: Total annual methane emission fluxes from Agriculture sources (sum of inventory categories: Enteric Fermentation (3A), Manure Management (3B), Rice Cultivation (3C), Field Burning of Agricultural Residues (3F)).

total-natural-gas-systems.title: Total Natural Gas Systems (annual)
total-natural-gas-systems.description: Total annual methane emission fluxes from Natural Gas Systems (sum of inventory Energy 1B2b sub-categories which includes Natural Gas Production, Transmission & Storage, Processing, Distribution and Exploration).

total-petroleum-systems.title: Total Petroleum Systems (annual)
total-petroleum-systems.description: Total annual methane emission fluxes from Petroleum Systems (sum of inventory Energy 1B2a sub-categories which includes Petroleum Production, Refining, Exploration and Transport).

total-waste.title: Total Waste (annual)
total-waste.description: Total annual methane emission fluxes from Waste (sum of inventory Waste categories: Municipal Solid Waste (MSW) and Industrial Landfills (5A1), Composting (5B1), Domestic and Industrial Wastewater Treatment and Discharge (5D)).

total-other.title: Total Other (annual)
total-other.description: Total annual methane emission fluxes from ‘Other’ remaining sources (sum of inventory categories 1A (Energy Combustion), 2B8 & 2C2 (Petrochemical & Ferroalloy Production) and 1B2a & 1B2b (Abandoned Oil & Gas Well Emissions)).

total-coal-mines.title: Total Coal Mines (annual)
total-coal-mines.description: Total annual methane emission fluxes from Coal Mines (sum of inventory 1B1a sub-categories which includes Underground Coal Mining, Surface Coal Mining and Abandoned Underground Coal Mines).
